Package be.kdg.persist

Class SailboatDbDao

java.lang.Object
be.kdg.persist.SailboatDbDao
All Implemented Interfaces:
SailboatDao
public class SailboatDbDao extends Object implements SailboatDao
This class implements the SailboatDao interface and provides methods for interacting with the database for Sailboat objects. It includes methods for inserting, deleting, updating, retrieving, and sorting Sailboat objects.
